item.title: 捷克央行行长警告不要将利率维持在过低水平
item.description: 捷克央行行长 Ales Michl 表示，捷克央行降低利率是正确的，但决策者必须避免重蹈覆辙，长期将借贷成本维持在极低水平。【原文：The Czech central bank was right to bring interest rates lower but policymakers must avoid repeating the mistake of holding borrowing costs extremely low for a long period, according to Governor Ales Michl.】

item.title: 据称亿万富翁米塔尔将为 Airtel Money 2026 年的首次公开募股与花旗集团合作
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁苏尼尔-米塔尔（Sunil Mittal）的非洲电信公司（Airtel Africa Plc）已经为其移动支付部门的首次公开募股计划找到了花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Billionaire Sunil Mittal’s Airtel Africa Plc has tapped Citigroup Inc. for a planned initial public offering of its mobile money unit, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 非洲最大杂货商拓展食品业务，提高利润率
item.description: 非洲最大的连锁超市 Shoprite Holdings Ltd. 加倍努力扩大其在本土市场的食品业务，并发展服装、婴儿用品、户外用品和宠物用品专卖店。【原文：Shoprite Holdings Ltd. doubled down on expanding its food business in its home market as well as growing specialist clothing, baby, outdoor and pet stores as Africa’s largest supermarket chain focuses on improve gross margins year-on-year.】

item.title: 英国 30 年期债券收益率攀升至 1998 年以来最高水平
item.description: 英国长期债券的收益率升至 1998 年以来的最高点，这进一步给首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）的政府施加了压力，迫使其采取措施重拾市场信心。【原文：The yield on long-dated UK bonds rose to the highest since 1998, putting further pressure on Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s government to take steps to regain the confidence of markets.】

item.title: 沙特启动抵押担保市场以推动流动性
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯首次推出了住宅抵押贷款支持证券，此举旨在提高流动性，鼓励银行增加贷款，以推动王国的经济转型计划。【原文：Saudi Arabia has launched its first residential mortgage backed securities in a move designed to boost liquidity and encourage more bank lending to drive the kingdom’s economic transformation program.】

item.title: 铜接近本月最高点，金属因降息押注而上涨
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所的铜价接近五周高点，原因是美国降息预期为工业商品提供了支撑。【原文：Copper on the London Metal Exchange was trading near a five-week high as industrial commodities received support from US rate-cut expectations.】

item.title: 印度银行告知印度央行购买国家债券的空间有限
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，印度一些最大的银行已经告诉央行，它们已经没有余力购买各邦发行的债券了。【原文：Some of India’s biggest banks have told the central bank that they are running out of room to buy bonds issued by states, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 瑞士在线市场公司 SMG 宣布首次公开募股计划
item.description: SMG Swiss Marketplace Group AG 宣布了在瑞士证券交易所上市的计划，这将是瑞士一年多来首次实质性发行股票。【原文：SMG Swiss Marketplace Group AG announced plans to list on the SIX Swiss Exchange, which would mark Switzerland’s first substantial offering in more than a year.】

item.title: 施纳贝尔告诉路透社：欧洲央行应保持利率稳定
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）对路透社表示，在通胀风险上行的情况下，欧洲中央银行应将借贷成本维持在当前水平。【原文：The European Central Bank should maintain borrowing costs at current levels with inflation risks tilted to the upside, Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel told Reuters.】

item.title: 欧洲央行科切尔主张在下一次决策前保持谨慎
item.description: 奥地利新任欧洲中央银行理事会成员马丁-科切尔（Martin Kocher）主张在下一次利率决策前采取谨慎态度。【原文：Austria’s new European Central Bank Governing Council member Martin Kocher advocated for a cautious approach heading into the next decision over interest rates.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将跑赢疲软的欧洲股市
香港融资成本在股市波动中创下 5 月以来最大降幅
item.description: 由于本地股市回落抑制了短期资金需求，香港隔夜利率创下 5 月份以来最大降幅。【原文：Hong Kong’s overnight interest rate slid by the most since May as a pullback in local stocks dampened demand for short-term funding.】

item.title: 罗斯柴尔德通过列支敦士登交易促进中东财富管理
item.description: Rothschild & Co.将接管列支敦士登州银行在阿拉伯联合酋长国的子公司，从而加强其在全球最热门的财富管理市场之一的影响力。【原文：Rothschild & Co. is set to take over the United Arab Emirates subsidiary of the Liechtensteinische Landesbank, bolstering its presence in one of the world’s hottest markets for wealth management.】

item.title: 德国敦促欧洲阻止中国大量购买废铜
item.description: 德国经济部长凯瑟琳娜-雷切（Katherina Reiche）表示，欧洲需要通过阻止 "大量 "废金属流向中国来帮助其铜冶炼厂，这可能会为贸易紧张局势开辟一条新战线。【原文：Europe needs to help its copper smelters by stemming “huge” flows of scrap metal to China, Germany’s Economy Minister Katherina Reiche said, potentially opening up a new front in trade tensions.】

item.title: 星展集团收购联盟银行股份的计划被指陷入僵局
item.description: 据知情人士透露，星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）收购马来西亚联合银行有限公司（Alliance Bank Malaysia Bhd.【原文：DBS Group Holdings Ltd.’s plan to buy a stake in Alliance Bank Malaysia Bhd. has stalled as Singapore’s biggest bank has yet to get regulatory approval to commence talks, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 肯尼亚与国际货币基金组织（IMF）的谈判可能会拖到 2027 年大选之后
item.description: 分析人士说，肯尼亚从国际货币基金组织争取新资金的努力可能会旷日持久，因为双方都需要制定新的改革参数，而且资金可能只有在2027年大选之后才会开始流入。【原文：Kenya’s quest to secure new funding from the International Monetary Fund will likely be drawn out as both sides need to thrash out fresh reform parameters, and money may only begin flowing after 2027 elections, analysts say.】

item.title: 日本公司全球债券发行接近 1,000 亿美元里程碑全球债券发行接近 1,000 亿美元里程碑
item.description: 随着日本公司周二在一级债务市场上大举发行债券，日本发行商的美元和欧元债券发行量即将突破 1,000 亿美元，这是日本有史以来首次在一年中突破 1,000 亿美元。【原文：Japanese issuers are on the verge of topping $100 billion in bond issuance across dollars and euros for the first time ever in any year, as companies from the nation stormed the primary debt market on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉自印度发布以来获得约 600 份订单，引发全球增长疑虑
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Tesla Inc.’s long-awaited entry into India has delivered underwhelming results so far, with tepid bookings fueling fresh doubts about the company’s global growth outlook.】

item.title: 实验室培育的宝石正在夺走博茨瓦纳的钻石财富
item.description:
更廉价的实验室制造宝石的崛起正在剥夺该国的收入，而正是这些收入使该国人民成为撒哈拉以南非洲大陆最富有的人 

。【原文：

The rise of cheaper, lab-made gems is robbing the country of the revenue that’s made its people the richest on the sub-Saharan African mainland

item.title: 父亲退职时面临更严重的工资削减
item.description: 经济学家们曾经希望，灵活工作的时代将带来更加平衡的家庭动态— 以及父亲承担更多的照顾责任。但这并没有实现。【原文：Economists once hoped that an era of flexible working would lead to more balanced household dynamics — and dads taking on more caring duties. That hasn’t happened.】

item.title: 日本将在免税进口总限额内购买美国大米
item.description: 据东京最高贸易谈判代表称，日本将在其现有免税进口总上限的范围内处理美国提出的购买更多美国大米的要求，并且没有降低农产品关税的计划。【原文：Japan will handle US demands to buy more American rice within the confines of its existing overall cap on duty-free imports and has no plans to lower its tariffs on farm products, according to Tokyo’s top trade negotiator.】

item.title: 日本 10 年期债券在 2023 年以来最强劲拍卖后上涨
item.description: 日本的 10 年期国债拍卖出现了自 2023 年 10 月以来最强劲的需求，投资者被较高的收益率水平所吸引，从而有所缓解。【原文：Japan’s 10-year government bond auction saw its strongest demand since October 2023, bringing some relief as investors were attracted to elevated yield levels.】

item.title: 简街事件后印度再次收紧股票期权规则
item.description: 印度证券监管机构正在对股票指数期权交易实施进一步限制，以遏制投机行为，而在此之前几个月，印度证券监管机构刚刚对涉嫌操纵股票指数的简街集团（Jane Street Group）进行了打击。【原文：India’s securities regulator is imposing further restrictions on equity-index options trading in a bid to curb speculation, just months after its crackdown on Jane Street Group for alleged manipulation.】

item.title: CVC支持的FineToday第二次尝试首次公开募股
item.description: 日本个人护理用品生产商 FineToday Holdings Co. 公司去年取消了之前的上市尝试，现在已开始就可能的全球股票出售征求机构投资者的意见。【原文：FineToday Holdings Co. has started sounding out institutional investor demand for a possible global share sale after the Japanese personal-care goods maker canceled a previous attempt to go public last year.】

item.title: Metaplanet 持有者批准购买比特币的新融资工具
item.description: 日本比特币国库 Metaplanet 公司的一项提案获得了股东的批准，该提案使其能够通过优先股融资多达 5,550 亿日元（合 38 亿美元），从而在股价暴跌后扩大其融资选择。【原文：Japanese Bitcoin treasury Metaplanet Inc. secured shareholder approval for a proposal enabling it to raise as much as ¥555 billion ($3.8 billion) via preferred shares, in a bid to expand its financing options after its stock slumped.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称中国抑制价格战，信实集团将从中获益
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）认为，印度信实工业有限公司（Reliance Industries Ltd.）将从中国抑制各行各业产能过剩的举措以及该企业集团自身精简业务的努力中获益最多。【原文：India’s Reliance Industries Ltd. stands to benefit the most from China’s push to curb overcapacity from a gamut of industries, and the conglomerate’s own efforts to streamline its businesses, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油对印度来说更便宜了，因为美国加强了对贸易的批评
item.description: 俄罗斯原油对印度买家来说越来越便宜，因为新德里面临着美国要求其削减与莫斯科石油贸易的持续压力，特朗普政府称莫斯科正在帮助资助乌克兰战争。【原文：Russian crude is getting even cheaper for India buyers as New Delhi faces sustained US pressure to cut its oil trade with Moscow, which the Trump administration says is helping fund the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 菲律宾称高达 70% 的防洪预算因腐败而流失
item.description: 据财政部长拉尔夫-雷克托（Ralph Recto）称，菲律宾用于防洪项目的政府资金有高达 70% 因腐败而流失，过去两年的经济损失高达 20 亿美元。【原文：The Philippines loses up to 70% of government funds meant for flood control projects to corruption, with economic losses reaching as much as $2 billion for the past two years, according to Finance Secretary Ralph Recto.】

item.title: 日本央行副行长避免暗示加息时机
item.description: 日本央行副行长绯野良造重申了该行的一贯政策，即在条件允许的情况下上调基准利率，但未就何时可能上调基准利率作出任何暗示，从而导致日元走低。【原文：Bank of Japan Deputy Governor Ryozo Himino reiterated the bank’s standing policy on raising the benchmark rate if conditions allow while steering clear of making any hints as to when that might happen, sending the yen lower.】
